CustomField.description: Enter the batch size to split the "records to update" into smaller groups for processing (e.g., a batch size of 100 splits 2000 records into 20 batches/Apex transactions). This helps reduce the risk of hitting Salesforce governor limits by spreading the workload across multiple transactions. If left blank, all records will be processed in a single Apex transaction, which may increase the chance of exceeding limits. Choose a value based on the job's complexity and system constraints.
